name: ConnectablePublisher
desc: A publisher that provides an explicit means of connecting and canceling publication.

items.name: func connect() -> Cancellable
items.desc: Connects to the publisher, allowing it to produce elements, and returns an instance with which to cancel publishing.

items.name: func autoconnect() -> Publishers.Autoconnect<Self>
items.desc: Automates the process of connecting or disconnecting from this connectable publisher.
